column7:
Logics - For Insight
JustAsk - 
For Client use LE_ID
For Client Group replace LE_ID with U_PID
For Sector replace LE_ID with DD_Sec
View PERIOD as per PaPM against LE_ID

View LE_NAME as per PaPM against LE_ID
View U_PID as per PaPM against LE_ID.
